articles.author: Adrian Horton
articles.title: Disney chief Bob Iger says strike by writers and actors 'very disturbing' - The Guardian
articles.description: Iger, 72, says decision by Sag-Aftra to recommend strike action ‘will have a very, very damaging effect on the business’
articles.content: As a strike by Sag-Aftra appears imminent without a contract, the Disney chief executive, Bob Iger, has said writers and actors preparing to picket are not being realistic with their expectations, an… [+3800 chars]
